text: Leslie Allen Jordan (April 29, 1955 - October 24, 2022) was an American actor and writer. He played Lonnie Garr in Hearts Afire and Beverly Leslie in Will & Grace. In 2006, he won an Emmy Award. He became a popular Instagram celebrity during the COVID-19 pandemic. Jordan died on October 24, 2022 in Los Angeles, California after his car crashed into a building, aged 67. The cause of death was cardiac arrest caused by arteriosclerotic sudden cardiac dysfunction. ==References== Category:Emmy Award winning actors Category:1955 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Road accident deaths in California Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from Chattanooga, Tennessee Category:Writers from Tennessee Category:Deaths from cardiac arrest Category:Deaths from arteriosclerosis
title: Leslie Jordan
